text: Starman is a 1984 American science fiction romance movie directed by John Carpenter and starring Jeff Bridges (in his Oscar nominated role), Karen Allen, Charles Martin Smith, Richard Jaeckel, Robert Phalen. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures and was spun off into a short-lived television series in 1986. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1984 romance movies Category:1984 science fiction movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American romance movies Category:Movies about extraterrestrial life Category:Movies directed by John Carpenter Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies adapted into television series
title: Starman (movie)
